inclusion.criterion: Patient is a pregnant woman between 18 and 45 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The fetuses will be 28+0/7 to 31+6/7 weeks of gestational age
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of severe left- or right-sided CDH of the fetus: Observed/expected total lung volume equal to or less than 0.32 with more than 21% of liver herniated into the hemithorax.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Normal fetal echocardiogram or echocardiogram with a minor anomaly (such as small VSD) that in the opinion of the pediatric cardiologist will not affect postnatal outcome
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The mother must be healthy enough to have surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient and father of the baby provide signed informed consent that details the maternal and fetal risks involved with the procedure
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient willing to remain in Houston for the duration following balloon placement until delivery.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to abdominal surgery, fetoscopic surgery, or general anesthesia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy or previous adverse reaction to a study medication specified in this protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Preterm labor, preeclampsia, or uterine anomaly (e.g., large fibroid tumor) in the index pregnancy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Fetal aneuploidy, known structural genomic variants, other major fetal anomalies that may impact the fetal/neonatal survival or known syndromic mutation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Suspicion of major recognized syndrome (e.g. Fryns syndrome) on ultrasound or MRI
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is an obese woman with abdominal pain that started 4 days ago. She has a history of hypercholesterolemia and 2 NVDs. Her ultrasound revealed several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones.
